doc:description.doc:para: The PrinterConfig service is available via the system message bus. To access the service, use the com.redhat.PrinterConfig interface on the /com/redhat/PrinterConfig object on the D-Bus system bus service with the well-known name com.redhat.PrinterConfig.
It is intended to be used by udev when USB printers are connected and disconnected.

doc:summary.doc:para: The udev devpath of the device with subsystem usb and devtype usb_device referring to the USB printer device.
The IEEE 1284 Device ID (not including length field) of the device.

doc:description.doc:para: This method informs the PrinterConfig service that a USB printer is now connected.

doc:description.doc:para: This method informs the PrinterConfig service that a USB printer has been disconnected.
